solution_line_template: Dave buys {books_animals} books + {books_outer_space} books + {books_trains} books = <<{books_animals}+{books_outer_space}+{books_trains}={total_books}>>{total_books} books in total.
He has to spend {total_books} books * ${cost_per_book}/book = $<<{total_books}*{cost_per_book}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} if he wants to buy all the books.
